Hazelnut No internet connection detected. No internet connection detected. Tap to change settings. Reconnect Welcome Ninja! Verification SMS Identification No. Map Scanner Camera Username Password Login No account yet? Register as a driver with us today! Retry Invalid credentials for user %1$s\nPlease check your username and password and try again.\n\nIf the issue persists, please contact your fleet supervisor for assistance. Connection Problem Account Problem Server Problem Status: %1$s Username Error Password Error Provisioning Error. Please try again.\nIf the issue persists, please contact operator for assistance. Welcome! You don\'t have any routes at the moment. View Good Morning! Good Afternoon! Good Evening! Start your journey by clicking below: %1$s minutes to unclaim Scan In %1$d Route(s) Route %1$d %1$d of %2$d locations complete You have %1$d route(s) in progress Are you sure you want to unclaim route %1$d? You cannot unclaim this route anymore. Route Unbid Route (%1$s) Failed to unbid route SCAN NOW Offline Error Sequence: %1$d %1$s\n%2$s Route not started, please scan your parcels. This waypoint has no jobs This reservation has been rejected. Please scan your parcels before proceeding Connected. Scan now. Enter Tracking ID Start route End Scan %1$d of %2$d Unknown Duplicate scan: Success scan: Wrong parcel duplicate scan: Wrong parcel scanned: Duplicate parcel without order scanned: Parcel without order scanned: Parcel in route scanned: %1$d Scanned %1$d To Scan Undo Please check your current parcel count and press \'Start route\' when you are ready. No Parcel Scanned. Remove %1$s (%2$s) List unavailable.\nScan all the parcels given to you! Remove Parcels %1$d of %2$d Parcel(s) Accepted %1$d of %2$d Parcel(s) Unscanned %1$d of %2$d Parcel(s) Removed %1$d Parcel Exception(s) Accepted (%1$d) Unscanned (%1$d) Exception (%1$d) Confirmation Cancel OK Continue Retry Continue Scan Error scan This parcel is not included in your route Please set aside the parcel and continue. Set Aside Parcels: %1$d Enter Password You have scanned %1$d parcels.\n\nPlease confirm that you would like to end the scanning process. Unknown Parcel You have scanned a parcel that is not in the order list.\n\nPlease check with the shipper, and accept the parcel if the shipper wishes to proceed with the order. Route(s) have been updated! Failed to update route data, orders might not be up-to-date. Warning Please tap on the parcel that you want to attach stamp to before proceeding. Reminder Please try contacting the customer before attempting to fail this location. Failed to refresh route data. Please try again.\nIf the issue persists, please contact operator for assistance. GPS Warning Is your GPS turned on? Your GPS must be turned on at all times, regardless of whether you are using Maps. Failure to turn on GPS may result in Penalties. Open GPS Settings Operator Authentication You have selected a few parcels to be excluded from intended route.\n\nPlease approach the operator for assistance to start the route. Incomplete Scans Discrepancy Scans Missing Parcels: %1$d There is a discrepancy in the scanned parcels.\n\nPlease approach the operator for assistance to start your route. Go Back You just scanned a parcel that is not in the parcel list of this location.\n\nPlease inform the operator of this unknown parcel when you return to the warehouse. You just scanned a parcel that is not in the pick up list.\n\nPlease call your supervisor and provide the tracking id to confirm if the parcel needs to be picked up. You have not scanned all the parcels required for your route.\n\nYou will not be able to add parcels after you end this scan process. There is a new version of the Ninja Driver app. Please update your app before continuing. Route Sync Problem Found duplicate waypoints with ID:%1$s\n\nPlease contact your fleet supervisor for assistance. Found duplicate route with ID %1$d, a CDS open route is found in your current routes, please contact your fleet supervisor for assistance. Found invalid latitude and / or longitude for waypoint %1$d, please contact your fleet supervisor for assistance. There is a new Ninja Driver (Global) app available. Please download and use the new app. Bug Report Send your app logs to %1$s team? This is a duplicate waypoint with ID:%1$d\nPlease contact your fleet supervisor for assistance before proceeding. Failed to sync app version data.\nCheck your internet connection and try again. Wrong Device Time Is your phone time accurate?\nMake sure your phone time is accurate, or \'automatic date & time\' is turned on at all times. Failure to do so may result in Penalties. Select your role in the parcel transfer process: Transfer Parcels to Driver Tap here to generate a code to authorise another driver to receive your parcels Receive Parcels from Driver Tap here to scan and add parcels from another driver into your route Instructions Ask the recipient to tap the \'Parcel Transfer\' button on the side menu bar. Request the recipient to tap the \'Receive Parcels\' from \'Driver\' button. Provide your Driver Code below to the recipient to complete the process. Select your next role in this parcel transfer process: Deliver Parcel Today Tap here if you can deliver the parcel today. The recipient will be notified of your arrival today. Transfer to Another Driver Tap here if you intend to transfer this parcel to another driver. Delivery to selected destinations within 1 working day. Where origin and destination are the same, we deliver within two working days, otherwise delivery timing varies according to distance. Are you sure you want to remove tracking ID from list? %1$d Tracking IDs removed See More All parcels in the following waypoint will be failed Location Service running See Route(s) Stop Service Rejected TID Duplicate TID in RSVN Okay, got it Oops, something went wrong Try Again Due to coronavirus outbreak, we would like to remind all drivers to take the following precautions:\n\n1) Do not touch your face or eyes without washing your hands\n2) Wash hands frequently with water and soap or use hand sanitiser\n3) Wear a mask if available\n4) Cover mouth with tissue when coughing or sneezing\n5) See a doctor if you are unwell\n\nThank you for your hard work at Ninja Van. Let’s keep everyone healthy. Your well-being is our concern Sync POD List There\'s nothing here at the moment Failed Sync present Failed Sync will be re-attempted automatically. Make sure you scroll through the whole table. Thanks. Error! Date of Route %1$s has already passed. Approach your fleet supervisor to correct. The transaction is currently marked as successful. To fail it, approach your fleet supervisor. Take photo of only the parcel and house area. Do not take a photo of the recipient without consent. For tracking the package in the future and contact our customer support, use Ninjachat now through this link: https://bit.ly/ninjachatkurir. Thank you! The world is your oyster. This application may be monitored for all lawful purposes, including ensuring that its use is authorised, for management of the system, to facilitate protection against unauthorised access, and to verify security procedures, survivability and operational security. \n\nAll information including personal information, placed on or sent over this application may be monitored. Evidence of any such unauthorised or unlawful use collected during monitoring may be used for administrative, criminal or other actions. Marketplace: Lazada, Tiktok, Shopee, Tokopedia, Bukalapak, Blibli\n2. Non-MP: Soscom, KPP, BPJS, Bank, Mitra The amount you’ll receive for delivering a parcel depends on the size of the parcel, who is sending the parcel and in what region you’re delivering it. For each successful parcel you\'ll earn bonus points. To earn your daily bonus you have to reach certain points.\n For each successful parcel you\'ll earn bonus points. To earn your daily bonus you have to reach certain points.\n \u2022 A = get total bonus of Rp XX,000 \n \u2022 B = get total bonus of Rp YY,000 \u0020 \u0020 \u2022 %d points = get total bonus of Rp%s\n The amount you’ll receive for delivering a parcel depends on the weight of the parcel. If you go beyond 70% success rate, you’ll be on the bonus rate. Every month, you will get a fixed based pay. This base pay will be given to you along with daily and monthly bonus. Driver Name Greater Jakarta A Regular | non-MP Regular | marketplace Regular | pickup Bulky | pickup Small & Medium Large & X-Large RTS Bulky | marketplace %s Points Points Bulky | non-MP The amount of points you\'ll earn depends on the size of the parcels. You can see your daily bonus targets and progress under the Today section on the \'My Earnings\' page. You can see your daily success rate under the Today section on the \'My Earnings\' page. You can see your monthly bonus progress under the Balloon bonus section on the \'My Earnings\' page. You can see your daily incentive minimum and progress under the Today section on the \'My Bonus\' page. Throughout the day, figures displayed might not be fully up to date but will be accurate at the end of the day. Monthly Bonus To earn your monthly bonus you have to deliver a minimum number of parcels while also maintain a high success rate of your deliveries. Your monthly balloon bonus grows as you hit your parcel target milestones. Any parcel more than 8 kg will be counted twice for balloon bonus. Daily Incentives After reaching the daily minimum of 45 parcels, each additional successful parcel qualifies for a daily incentive. The amount you\'ll receive for each parcel depends on the service type and weight of the parcel. After reaching the daily minimum of 55 parcels, each additional successful parcel qualifies for a daily incentive. The amount you\'ll receive for each parcel depends on the service type and weight of the parcel. The incentive you\'ll receive for each parcel depends on the service type and weight of the parcel. Monthly deliveries None Customer complaints Fraudulent behaviour You will not be eligible for a bonus in a month, if there are any customer complaints or signs of fraudulent behaviour. Invalid PODA Proof of delivery attempt uploaded by rider and after investigation, if it\'s legally declared not in accordance with applicable regulations, rider will be subject to a fine. Lost and Damage Parcel are lost or damaged and after investigation, if it\'s legally declared that parcel was lost or damaged because of rider in accordance with applicable regulations, rider will be subject to a fine. Others Other deductions, such as rider committing COD fund fraud, etc Deduction The amount you\'ll receive might be deducted for the following reason: Daily Bonus DELIVERY PICKUP DELIVERY, PICKUP FROM CUSTOMER PICKUP FROM MERCHANT Scan parcels before delivery Remove parcel not in waypoint This parcel is not in the selected waypoint. Please approach the operator for assistance to start your route. Invalid code Waypoint ID does not match TIDs cannot be displayed When will I get a card? A driver needs to ensure that their daily success rate is above 75%. Otherwise, they run the risk of getting a card as a penalty. Minimum daily success rate In each station, card will be given to max. 2 (two) drivers with the lowest success rate under the threshold. If there are multiple drivers that have the same success rate, then the driver with lesser parcels will be given card. What happens if I get a card? If a driver receives a card, they will be given a suspension period. The duration of the suspension depends on which card the driver receives. %s card %d day suspension %d days suspension Company action, might lead to termination Cards will reset two (2) months after your first card. _ This allows driver an opportunity to improve and maintain a clean record.
